Package shapes3d

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    _FlatMesh2D
    Unlike its parent class this represents a flat mesh.
    _MD2mesh
    This class is responsible for managing the animation and rendering of the MD2 model
    _ShapePart
    Some shapes can't be drawn with a single mesh, so these shapes have multiple parts.
    _TerrainMesh2D
    A terrain mesh differs from the _Mesh2D and _FlatMesh2D in that you can specify the XZ position and distance to be rendered.
    Box
    A regular axis aligned 3D box shape with 6 sides that can have different visual attributes.
    Dome
    This class represents a simple Dome (top half of an ellipsoid.
    DoubleCone
    Imagine two cones joined at their wide end with their central axis aligned with the y axis then have the DoubleCone.
    Ellipsoid
    Class to represent an axis aligned ellipsoid.
    Extrusion
    The shape formed when a polygon travels along a path in 3D space
    GraphAxes
    Creates a 3D set of XYZ axis to show the current orientation of the 3D graphics context.
    LatheStock
    A shape that might have been created on a lathe.
    MD2shape
    This shape can be built using 1 to 8 linked MD2 models.
    S3D
    This class is provided to simplify the use of library constants e.g.
    Shape3D
    This is the base class for all 3D shapes.
    ShapeGroup
    Simple class to allow a collection of shapes to be moved and rotated as a group.
    SkyBox
    A box where all the sides are of equal length that can be textured to give the appearance of continuous sky.
    SkyDome
    A circular dome of user defined height that can be textured to give the appearance of continuous sky.
    Terrain  
    Tube
    The shape formed when an oval (circle or ellipse) travels along a path in 3D space
